entries.description: Fix issue #270 by adding tags on lambda update
Fix issue #272 by no longer printing the command
Fix issue #259: auto-install new version of the lambda tools globally if required.
Add the ability to set CacheControl for an upload to S3 (issue #50)
Refresh list of Lambda runtimes to the currently supported runtimes
Remove Lambda .NET Core 1.0, it is EOL
